attributes.action: remove the knighthood from Sir Fred Goodwin and Sir Tom McKillop.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir Fred Goodwin and Sir Tom McKillop, former bosses of failed bank Royal Bank of Scotland should have their knighthood removed due to the mistakes which have cost the taxpaper over £37 billion. Their ridiculous errors mean they are no longer worthy of their titles.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
